name: Les Contes Magiques: Marie Lévesque
description:
You play as Marie Lévesque, a 2nd-year student at the prestigious Ardok University.  Since the beginning of civilization, this institute was built as one of many other guardian towers, meant to both train and employ defenders.  Manage your schedule as you get to know your fellow classmates!

Developer Notes: This game was originally meant to be released for SuNoFes2015, but unfortunately, I was too optimistic about what I could do in a month.  It was stuck in development hiatus for an extremely long time, but I finally pushed myself to finish it!  The game is rather short, but I hope you all enjoy it.  :)

Please contact me at games@chocojax.com if you have any comments!

Features:
★ Approximately 13,500 words
★ 8 unique tracks
★ Scheduling/Events system
★ Stat-raising
★ Custom artwork

Staff:
Artist, Writer, Programmer - chocojax (http://chocojax.com/)
Musician - Doctor Jekyll (https://soundcloud.com/doctor_jekyll/)
Musician - Ziassan (https://soundcloud.com/ziassan/)

Support me on Patreon for more art and games!
